attributes.action: Get rid of the invasive automated service on London buses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Automated service is useful on trains, as you travel long distances between stations and might not neccesarily know where you are, the amount of announcements per minute on a bus though is ridiculous, you can sometimes get up to 4-5 loud announcements a minute. Everytime the bus stops you are told which bus you are on. Why has this system been introduced? It isn't neccessary and makes the bus journey unpleasant in my opinion

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Transport for London.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
